top_stories.title: Amazon’s AI assistant comes to the web with Alexa.com
top_stories.description: Amazon is bringing Alexa+ to the web with a new Alexa.com site, expanding its AI assistant beyond devices and positioning it as a family-focused, agent-style chatbot.
top_stories.author: Sarah Perez
top_stories.content: Amazon is bringing Alexa+ to the web with a new Alexa.com site, expanding its AI assistant beyond devices and positioning it as a family-focused, agent-style chatbot.

top_stories.title: AI agent-driven browser automation for enterprise workflow management
top_stories.description: Enterprise organizations increasingly rely on web-based applications for critical business processes, yet many workflows remain manually intensive, creating operational inefficiencies and compliance risks. Despite significant technology investments, knowledge workers routinely navigate between eight to twelve different web applications during standard workflows, constantly switching contexts and manually transferring information between systems. Data entry and validation tasks […]
top_stories.author: Kosti Vasilakakis
top_stories.content: Enterprise organizations increasingly rely on web-based applications for critical business processes, yet many workflows remain manually intensive, creating operational inefficiencies and compliance risks. top_stories.title: Introducing Visa Intelligent Commerce on AWS: Enabling agentic commerce with Amazon Bedrock AgentCore
top_stories.description: In this post, we explore how AWS and Visa are partnering to enable agentic commerce through Visa Intelligent Commerce using Amazon Bedrock AgentCore. We demonstrate how autonomous AI agents can transform fragmented shopping and travel experiences into seamless, end-to-end workflows—from discovery and comparison to secure payment authorization—all driven by natural language.
top_stories.author: Sangeetha Bharath, Seemal Zaman
top_stories.content: In this post, we explore how AWS and Visa are partnering to enable agentic commerce through Visa Intelligent Commerce using Amazon Bedrock AgentCore. We demonstrate how autonomous AI agents can transform fragmented shopping and travel experiences into seamless, end-to-end workflows—from discovery and comparison to secure payment authorization—all driven by natural language.

top_stories.title: LLM-Pruning Collection: A JAX Based Repo For Structured And Unstructured LLM Compression
top_stories.description: Zlab Princeton researchers have released LLM-Pruning Collection, a JAX based repository that consolidates major pruning algorithms for large language models into a single, reproducible framework. It targets one concrete goal, make it easy to compare block level, layer level and weight level pruning methods under a consistent training and evaluation stack on both GPUs and […] The post LLM-Pruning Collection: A JAX Based Repo For Structured And Unstructured LLM Compression appeared first on...

top_stories.title: Faster agents, bigger blast radius: Why agent governance is the new control plane for resilience
top_stories.description: As enterprises accelerate their move toward autonomous workflows powered by artificial intelligence, the urgent need for robust AI agent governance has become a critical operational mandate. An agent’s potential relies on the fact that they can perform higher-level tasks, including assuming identities and executing business processes. But if that is compromised, attackers have effectively hijacked […] The post Faster agents, bigger blast radius: Why agent governance is the new control plane for...
